title: About SafeHouse
description: SafeHouse is your ultimate secure storage solution, protecting your most sensitive data with cutting-edge encryption. Store passwords, notes, documents, events, and credit/debit cards. Your information is always encrypted, private, and accessible only to you.

features.title: 🔐 Advanced Encryption
features.description: Your passwords and payment card details are encrypted using a zero-knowledge encryption model, meaning only you can unlock them with your master password. Even SafeHouse cannot access your encrypted data.

features.title: 📁 Store Everything Securely
features.description: Keep your notes, events, and important documents in one place, accessible whenever you need them.

features.title: 🛡️ Privacy-First Design
features.description: SafeHouse never stores or transmits your master password. Your encryption key is derived from your master password and unique salt, ensuring that your data remains unreadable to anyone but you.

features.title: 📅 Organize Effortlessly
features.description: Manage your passwords, track events, and store important documents in an intuitive, user-friendly interface.

features.title: 🖥️📱 Seamless Access Across Devices
features.description: Securely access your data on both web and mobile without compromising security.

privacy_commitment.title: Your Privacy, Your Control
privacy_commitment.description: At SafeHouse, privacy is our priority. Unlike other storage apps, we do not store, track, or analyze your sensitive data. Your information belongs to you, and only you can access it.

closing_message: Stay organized, stay secure, and take control of your data with SafeHouse. 🚀
